name: neoclassicism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a style of art and design that is based on the art and buildings of ancient Greece and Rome: The vast domed church is a monument to late-eighteenth-century neoclassicism. His early works combined neoclassicism and Armenian folk traditions. See
neoclassical
More examplesFewer examplesHer works show influences from neoclassicism.the elegant neoclassicism of sculptor Antonio CanovaEarly 19th-century Germany fully exploited Neoclassicism and Romanticism.
